item.title: POJ 2376 Cleaning Shifts
item.author: Author
item.description: \(N\) (\(1 \le N \le 25,000\)) cows, each cow only available for a interval of time. \(T\) (\(1 \le T \le 1,000,000\)) shifts. Find minimum number of cows to complete \(T\) shifts. Link: http://poj.org/problem?id=2376 Notes Each shift must has at least one cow assigned to it. A cow finishes after the end time. That is, if there are two cows, start and end at \((1, 3)\) and \((4, 10)\) respectively.
